text:
```html

Loan Agreement

This Corporate Loan Agreement (“Agreement”) is made effective as of $REPLACE by and between $REPLACE (“Lender”) and $REPLACE, a corporation organized under the laws of Alabama, with its principal office at $REPLACE (“Borrower”).

1. Loan Terms

Loan Amount. Lender agrees to lend Borrower $REPLACE.

Interest. The interest rate shall be $REPLACE.

Repayment. The Loan shall be repaid in $REPLACE installments beginning $REPLACE, continuing until $REPLACE months/years, unless accelerated upon default.

Prepayment. Prepayment is $REPLACE.

Late Fee. A late fee of $REPLACE applies after $REPLACE days delinquent.

2. Covenants

Borrower agrees to comply with the following covenants:

  • Maintain Debt Service Coverage Ratio of $REPLACE.
  • Maintain Minimum Net Worth of $REPLACE.
  • Deliver audited financials annually.
  • Provide quarterly management-prepared P&L and balance sheet.

Negative covenants include:

  • No additional debt > $REPLACE without consent.
  • No dividends/distributions > $REPLACE.
  • No mergers, acquisitions, or major asset sales.
  • No change of control without consent.

Affirmative covenants include:

  • Maintain insurance with lender named as loss payee.
  • Pay all taxes and remain in good standing.
  • Keep adequate books and allow inspection.

3. Security

Borrower grants Lender a first-priority security interest in the Collateral described in Exhibit E. Borrower agrees to execute all documents necessary to perfect this interest, including UCC-1 filings.

4. Guarantees

As additional assurance, $REPLACE guarantees full repayment of Borrower’s obligations. See Exhibit C.

5. Defaults & Remedies

Events of Default include:

  • Nonpayment after $REPLACE days.
  • Insolvency or bankruptcy.
  • Breach of covenant or representation.
  • Unauthorized transfer or merger.

Upon Default, Lender may accelerate all amounts due, enforce security interests, collect collateral, and seek legal remedies including attorney’s fees.

6. Miscellaneous

This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of $REPLACE. Any disputes arising from this Agreement shall be resolved through $REPLACE.

Notices shall be sent to the addresses provided herein. Assignment of this Agreement is $REPLACE.

This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties and may only be amended in writing.

7. Execution

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties execute this Agreement as of $REPLACE.

Borrower: $REPLACE

By: ________________________

Name: $REPLACE

Title: $REPLACE

Lender: $REPLACE

By: ________________________

Name: $REPLACE

Title: $REPLACE

This document is for educational purposes only. It is not legal advice. Consult a licensed attorney or notary.

```
